ICEBARÂ  RESTAURANT & LOUNGE is a classic, urban cocktail lounge & weekend nightclubÂ offering an array of spirits, beer, wine, visual & musical entertainment with anÂ unpretentious & welcoming feel. Â From the moment you step out of your car toÂ step inside our elegantÂ  gently-lit & welcoming space, youÂ are greeted by our door staff. Once you gasp at the ambience of theÂ environment,Â to the time you sit down at your table & meet your bottleÂ servers or to your first exchanges with our friendly bartenders, you will see that we are committed to fostering a fun, diverse & inclusive environment - the same valuesÂ for which the City of Atlanta. â€‹ At the ICEBAR, we DO impose a dress code: â€‹- No "Slides" or Flip Flops allowed â€‹- FRIDAY AND SATURDAY after 9PM - athletic gear not preferred We also expect guests to treat each other & our staff as they wouldÂ want to be treated, with respect. We reserve the right to denyÂ service or entry if patrons are deemed "inappropriately dressed" in a way which is unacceptable,Â offensive or disrespectful to any of our other guests or employees. We askÂ ALL guests to drink responsibly . IceBar is a locally-owned, small business; medium in size for an Atlanta bar orÂ lounge. We handle all of our own marketing, DJ talent, VIP table & private eventÂ booking internally to ensure you have the best experience possible. We do notÂ regularly work with club promoters, so you can count on the fact that as a guest orÂ event organizer, you will experience consistent, high-quality service. IceBar is open seven days a week from 12NoonÂ to 3 AMÂ to host happy hour functions, networkingÂ events, charitable fundraisers or for just about any type of celebration you can imagine!Â .
